alert.note: Alert for Hunt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 10:50AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hunt County through 1115 AM CDT... At 1050 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Celeste, or 13 miles northwest of Greenville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Commerce, Wolfe City, Caddo Mills, Celeste, Campbell, Greenville Club Lake, Merit, Greenville City Lakes, Josephine, Union Valley, Neylandville, Kellogg, Kingston, Cash, Clinton, Fairlie, South Sulphur, Center Point and Floyd. This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 80 and 108. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
